document.full_text: the vatican put a new rule into effect requiring that anyone bringing 10,000 euros (about $14,000) or more into vatican city declare it to vatican authorities.
document.title: europe: vatican: visitors must declare cash
lines_and_colors: the vatican put a new rule into effect requiring that anyone bringing 10,000 euros (about $14,000) or more into vatican city declare it to vatican authorities.
